message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $11,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
